attributes.action: Sack MP’s that are traitors by failing to support the leave vote. Brexit by 29th
attributes.additional_details:
Is the UK a democratic society?
The U.K. voted and the referendum result was clear, Leave the EU and take back control.
After 2.5 years this government have failed to secure an acceptable Leave deal. It’s time to leave with No deal. No deal is better than a bad deal. We should keep all our money and stop giving the EU any more money.
attributes.background: Sack all MP’s that are traitors, delaying and failing to support leaving the EU on the 29th March. These MP’s are ignoring the U.K. Brexit vote to leave the EU and take back ALL control. Do Not give the EU any more money. Leave means Leave. MP’s just want to preserve their MEP jobs and lucrative pay

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or the Prime Minister to be sacked.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.

You may wish to sign this petition instead: 

 https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963
